text: Why don't you take a look at this picture and tell me everything that you see going on in that picture. Everything that you see happening. Okay, the boy is standing up trying to get to the jar and the stool is falling. The girl is reaching up to get a cookie out of his hand. Another is at the window washing dishes. The sink is overflowing. I'm getting on his shoes. And there are saucers and a plate on the... But you want to know what's going on? You want to tell you what's on the sink to everything? Oh, well, that's all I see happening plus some point.
